extension.description: Automatically run Picture-in-Picture service code when Kodi starts.
Picture-in-Picture Dienst starte automatisch wenn Kodi startet.
extension.news:
v2.3.1 (2021-08-16) - fixed ffmpeg capture settings for raspberry pi 4 and libreelec in order to avoid capturing broken images
v2.3.0 (2021-08-09) - improved image handling by using unique filename in order to force a reload by setImage() function - framerate up to 25 fps possible (but with high CPU load!)
v2.2.0 (2021-08-03) - replace "curl" by a native python implementation using urllib - added error handling for tvheadend connection - added error handling for m3u file format
v2.1.0 (2021-07-25) - put picture-in-picture handling in separate class - added setting "frames per seconds"
v2.0.0 (2021-07-23) - complete refactor "autostart.h", "pipffmepg.py" and "script.picture.pip" not longer required - only one service addons necessary - keymap uses now notifiyAll instead of a runScript call - prepared to run not only on librelec ... test on ubuntu installation passed
v1.0.0 (2021-07-17) - inital version
